message.raw:
Sandia hands camera default update rates will be limited to 30Hz in drcsim 2.6.x (currently drcsim 2.5.x has them set to 60Hz but most graphic cards have a hard time hitting it).  Corresponding change has also been made on the Sandia hand hardware.

We will not make Sandia hand camera rates adjustable and will keep ROS topic `/multisense_sl/fps` for setting head camera update rate before VRC.  Putting this on hold for now.
message.html:
Sandia hands camera default update rates will be limited to 30Hz in drcsim 2.6.x (currently drcsim 2.5.x has them set to 60Hz but most graphic cards have a hard time hitting it). Corresponding change has also been made on the Sandia hand hardware.

We will not make Sandia hand camera rates adjustable and will keep ROS topic /multisense_sl/fps for setting head camera update rate before VRC. Putting this on hold for now.
